resources.string:
Socials Addict 
 
The innovative way to track your Social networks usage and cut your addiction

 
 V6.0 Changlog: 

-Updated to Material Design 
-new Icons 
-New logo 
-Changed timers dependcy to service 
-Fixed force close 
-More accurate timers 
-Added boot reciver 
-Re-coded most of the app from scratch 
-Tablet support in design 
-Bug fixes and stability improvement 
-Actions in notifications 
-Show your usage report directly from any app through notifications

Pi Developers 
Creativity is our middle name. 

We are team of young developers trying to indrotude new ideas to android users and make them use the most of there phones. 

Our goal is to provide same experince on all devices possible, we support all major android versions (3.3.x - 5.x)
